ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: He says, 'I have consumed vast quantities of wealth.'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: He says: "I have wasted a great deal of wealth."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: He says: “I have squandered enormous wealth.”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: (He boasts and shows off) saying, "I have spent a great deal of money (for the cause of God)".
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: He says: "I have wasted wealth in abundance!"
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: He shall say: I have wasted much wealth.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: And he saith: I have destroyed vast wealth:
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: He says, "I have spent enormous wealth."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: He saith: 'I have wasted riches plenteous.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: He says, ‘I have squandered immense wealth.’
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: He may say (boastfully); Wealth have I squandered in abundance!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: He says (boastfully): "I have wasted wealth in abundance!"
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: He will say: 'I have destroyed a vast wealth'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: He says, “I have used up so much money.”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: He says, "I have spent wealth in abundance."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [90:6] He says, ‘I have exhausted, in enmity of Muhammad (s), vast wealth!’, great [wealth], piles and piles of it.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (And he) Kildah Ibn Usayd; and it is also said: al-Walid Ibn al-Mughirah (saith: I have destroyed vast wealth) I have spent abundant wealth in enmity towards Muhammad, Allah bless him, and this did not benefit me:
